## NoStringLocalizationService class

Default implementation of StringLocalization, which uses 'key' as localization text

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class NoStringLocalizationService implements StringLocalization 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [textsChange](./common.nostringlocalizationservice.textschange.md) |  | <code>Observable&lt;void&gt;</code> | Occurs when indication that locale has changes and strings should be obtained again, because they have changed |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [get(key, interpolateParams)](./common.nostringlocalizationservice.get.md) |  | Gets localized string for specified key, interpolation might be used |
